title: Text on a pakage for mobile screen gaurd , mainly the "Smart Glaze" word , needs to indentify
author: Aj1001

comments.content:
It looks similar to a thinner version of [Datacron](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055515/http:/www.dafont.com/datacron.font?fpp=100&text=SMART+GLAZE), which could be based on something else.

- Mike Yanega

I'm with you Ryuk. That could have been the model for the font I found, since he says it was based on copy text on a toyline from 2012-13.

- Mike Yanega
